name: AI
description: Consume and implement autonomous AI services such as models and agents.

name: Automation
description: Automate smart contract tasks that cannot be achieved purely on the blockchain.

name: Oracles
description: Get data onto the blockchain in a robust way.

name: Relayers
description: Simplify the process of issuing transactions to the blockchain.

name: Messaging
description: Communicate between blockchains, autonomous services and users.

name: NFTs
description: Autonomous services for NFT collection, dynamic metadata etc.
